title: Bug 26133[Dialogs] TitleAreaDialog status line blinks when newMessage == currentMessage
description: Build id: 200211051258The current implementation for TitleAreaDialogshowMessage(String,int) methodhas a guard against updates to the message with the same content (to avoidneedlessly blinking).The problem is that after that the message may be concatenated with a spacecharacter:====================//If there is an image then add in a space to the message//for layout purposesif(newImage != null)message = " " + message; //$NONNLS1$====================So the guard will fail in the next call even if the same string is provided bythe client.
